DataElement.preferredName: Breast Imaging Procedure Tolerance Ability Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Verification at a particular time that the patient is able to tolerate breast imaging procedures, as outlined in the study protocol, in order to participate in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Breast Imaging Technique Tolerance Ability Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest._Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy._The allowable deviation from a standard; a permissible difference._The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment._Having been established or verified._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Property.preferredName: Tolerance Ability Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria

Concepts.definition: The allowable deviation from a standard; a permissible difference.
The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.
